page.title: 13Whitehills Children's Games
page.content:
{Lollipop Shop} Group turn their backs. 'Man' touches one and runs as far as possible before person touched shouts{ {STOP.}Man orders a form of movement - hop, skip, blind (walk,eyes shut), crawl, walk or jump. Person touched moves round Man in figure of eight while group chant: 'Hop,hop,hop to the Lollipop Shop 'To buy some sugar and candy, 'When you get there your mother's not there. 'So {STOP}right where you are.' If person can touch the Man from where she is {STOPPED}, they change roles.
{Peanuts} Children Wrestle with interlocked fingers at arms length till weaker cries{'Peanuts' {.}
